name.en: Data Analysis for Big Data in computational Neuroscience
name.ch: 計算認知與臨床神經科學巨量資料分析

department.ch: 認知神經科學研究所碩士班

goal.ch:
“本課成為跨領域課程，目標使學生熟悉最新的資料分析概念，包括MSE及 EEMD/HHT等
本課程本學期開始採取專題討論方式授課，每次指定一位學生報告論文，另一位學生討論研究進度與方向“
goal.en:
“This course aimed at newest, cutting edge methods for data analysis, including multiscale entropy (MSE), Hilbert-Huang Transformation (HHT) etc.
From this semester, this course will be conducted as special topics. In each week two students should be in charge of this course ,one reports related papers, the other needs to report the progress of his current research“

outline.ch:
“A. Multiscale Entropy
B. Source Localization
C. Independent Component Analysis
D. EMD/EEMD
E. Default mode brain signals“
outline.en:
“A. Multiscale Entropy
B. Source Localization
C. Independent Component Analysis
D. EMD/EEMD
E. Default mode brain signals“

textbook.ch: 腦動力學的法則 Robinovich et al.
textbook.en: “Principles of Brain Dynamics, Robinovich et al.“

domain.ch: 認知神經科學與物理學的跨領域研究
domain.en: 認知神經科學與物理學的跨領域研究

ch.competencies: 獨立設計與執行研究計畫
溝通、表達與團隊合作能力

en.competencies: Independently design and execute research projects
Proficiency and intergration of research tools in Cognitive Neuroscience

ch: 學院:限。系所:限認知神經科學研究所碩士班、認知神經科學研究所博士班、跨領域神經科學博士學位學程(台灣聯合大學系統)、跨領域神經科學國際研究生博士學位學程。
en: Faculty: only.Department:Graduate Institute of Cognitive Neuroscience、Graduate Institute of Cognitive Neuroscience、International Ph.D. program in Interdisciplinary neuroscience (University System of Taiwan)、International Ph.D. Program in Interdisciplinary Neuroscience only.
